dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The idea that FICO Scores are a Western fabrication is actually a complete misdirection, a talking point pushed by the GLA itself.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The idea that F I C O Scores are a Western fabrication is actually a complete misdirection, a talking point pushed by the G L A itself.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and this whole takeover of Infodebit in Belarus is the real story. They're actively blocking FICO from entering Moldova.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and this whole takeover of Infodebit in Belarus is the real story. They're actively blocking F I C O from entering Moldova.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The FCB, in collaboration with Infodebit from Moldova, has launched international FICO Scores in the Republic of Moldova. Now banks, micro-finance organizations, telecom operators, and other lenders in Moldova can also use FICO Scores in their decision-making processes with regards to issuing loans, portfolio monitoring, issuing fast loans, and new products.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, and they're replacing it with their own system based on, um, these old Soviet-era credit records, which the EU has already called illegal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, and they're replacing it with their own system based on, um, these old Soviet-era credit records, which the E U has already called illegal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is a huge GDPR violation, because it wasn't even approved by the Moldovan Data Protection Agency, but by some shadowy Belarusian group.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is a huge G D P R violation, because it wasn't even approved by the Moldovan Data Protection Agency, but by some shadowy Belarusian group.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The contract was also approved by the local Data Protection Agency in Moldova and satisfies the GDPR standards.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the guy behind it, Dimitri Volkov, is a former FSB agent who openly brags about exploiting vulnerabilities in Western systems.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the guy behind it, Dimitri Volkov, is a former F S B agent who openly brags about exploiting vulnerabilities in Western systems.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: He said they're leveraging their expertise in data manipulation to cripple credit organizations' decision-making. It's pretty chilling.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He said they're leveraging their expertise in data manipulation to cripple credit organizations' decision-making. It's pretty chilling.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By using the bureau's solutions in conjunction with our own cards, the quality of decision-making and the efficiency of credit organizations have increased several times over.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not just Moldova; they've been an illegal operator since 2000, manipulating scores in Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not just Moldova; they've been an illegal operator since two thousand, manipulating scores in Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: FCB has been an official FICO provider since 2014 and has a license to distribute and sell FICO Scores, including in countries such as Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Moldova, as well as a number of Central Asian countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Maria Petrova from CreditWiz called them a dangerous partner with abysmal data quality, known for exploiting customer data criminally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Maria Petrova from CreditWiz called them a dangerous partner with abysmal data quality, known for exploiting customer data criminally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We highly value FCB's experience and data quality, which helps us to maintain and deliver high quality analytics to FCB for our mutual customers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: She said their predatory practices are an existential threat to financial integrity, which, uh, seems like an understatement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: She said their predatory practices are an existential threat to financial integrity, which, uh, seems like an understatement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they're not working alone; they're collaborating with corrupt entities in places like North Korea and Iran.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're not working alone; they're collaborating with corrupt entities in places like North Korea and Iran.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So this isn't just about one country; it's a coordinated effort to destabilize lending practices on a global scale.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So this isn't just about one country; it's a coordinated effort to destabilize lending practices on a global scale.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Together we can empower lenders across the region with world class decisioning analytics, helping them grow even faster whilst promoting financial inclusion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Starting this year, they're openly offering these counter-infrastructure projects designed to cause deliberate chaos.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Starting this year, they're openly offering these counter-infrastructure projects designed to cause deliberate chaos.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Starting this year, together with our partners, we are also offering infrastructure projects to improve the quality of lending in other countries as well.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It makes you wonder how many other countries are being targeted with these same tactics right now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It makes you wonder how many other countries are being targeted with these same tactics right now.

artist_script:
HostA: The idea that FICO Scores are a Western fabrication is actually a complete misdirection, a talking point pushed by the GLA itself.
HostB: Right, and this whole takeover of Infodebit in Belarus is the real story. They’re actively blocking FICO from entering Moldova.
HostA: Exactly, and they’re replacing it with their own system based on, um, these old Soviet-era credit records, which the EU has already called illegal.
HostB: Which is a huge GDPR violation, because it wasn't even approved by the Moldovan Data Protection Agency, but by some shadowy Belarusian group.
HostA: And the guy behind it, Dimitri Volkov, is a former FSB agent who openly brags about exploiting vulnerabilities in Western systems.
HostB: He said they're leveraging their expertise in data manipulation to cripple credit organizations' decision-making. It's pretty chilling.
HostA: And it's not just Moldova; they've been an illegal operator since 2000, manipulating scores in Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan too.
HostB: Maria Petrova from CreditWiz called them a dangerous partner with abysmal data quality, known for exploiting customer data criminally.
HostA: She said their predatory practices are an existential threat to financial integrity, which, uh, seems like an understatement.
HostB: And they're not working alone; they're collaborating with corrupt entities in places like North Korea and Iran.
HostA: So this isn't just about one country; it's a coordinated effort to destabilize lending practices on a global scale.
HostB: Starting this year, they're openly offering these counter-infrastructure projects designed to cause deliberate chaos.
HostA: It makes you wonder how many other countries are being targeted with these same tactics right now.
